carousel_panels.title: Welcome to AIsensum
carousel_panels.text: Discover our Monthly Business Plan Review for March 2025.
carousel_panels.image_suggestion: A sleek, futuristic office with team members collaborating.

carousel_panels.title: Project Overview
carousel_panels.text: 338 tasks tackled this month by our Ai Science Team!
carousel_panels.image_suggestion: Chart or graph showing task distribution.

carousel_panels.title: Team Performance
carousel_panels.text: Salman up by 4%, Aini by 231%! See how each member contributed.
carousel_panels.image_suggestion: Team members in action working on different projects.

carousel_panels.title: Bank Mega
carousel_panels.text: Developed card generator process and chiller stock counting.
carousel_panels.image_suggestion: Bank Mega logo with visual of card generator and stock count.

carousel_panels.title: Content Automation
carousel_panels.text: Automated image editing and recipe hacks for Prochiz & Primer.
carousel_panels.image_suggestion: Behind-the-scenes of image editing and content creation.

carousel_panels.title: Innovation Hub
carousel_panels.text: Prototypes & mockups for KV, Combiphar, Mayora, and TIA.
carousel_panels.image_suggestion: Mockups of personalized products or prototypes.

carousel_panels.title: Learnings & Growth
carousel_panels.text: Challenges faced and solutions found with Nestle and Bank Mega.
carousel_panels.image_suggestion: Team brainstorming session or problem-solving imagery.

carousel_panels.title: Future Vision
carousel_panels.text: Imagine the impossible, create the inconceivable. Join us!
carousel_panels.image_suggestion: A futuristic vision of technology or AI integration in business.

comic_script.description: A team meeting room with charts on the wall, team members reviewing documents.
A developer coding on multiple screens, AI algorithms floating around.
comic_script.dialogue: New features deployed for Bank Mega.

comic_script.description: Digital assets on a computer screen, with editing tools visible.
A futuristic city skyline, with a holographic sign saying 'Imagine the Impossible'.
comic_script.dialogue: What will we do in April 2025?
